name: Edward A. BALL, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Ball v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Edward A. BALL, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of October, 2007, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is granted and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
934 A.2d 1152
Edward A. BALL, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Respondent.
No. 131 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 15, 2007.
